channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Alienware Command Center (AWCC)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Alienware Command Center (AWCC)

item.title: CVE-2021-36277|2024-09-17T03:59:48.037Z -- dell -- alienware%20command%20center%20%28awcc%29
item.description: Dell Command | Update, Dell Update, and Alienware Update versions before 4.3 contains an Improper Verification of Cryptographic Signature Vulnerability. A local authenticated malicious user may exploit this vulnerability by executing arbitrary code on the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-22450|2024-08-01T22:43:34.997Z -- dell -- alienware%20command%20center%20%28awcc%29
item.description: Dell Alienware Command Center, versions prior to 6.2.7.0, contain an uncontrolled search path element vulnerability. A local malicious user could potentially inject malicious files in the file search path, leading to system compromise.

item.title: CVE-2024-38301|2024-07-10T13:53:10.304Z -- dell -- alienware%20command%20center%20%28awcc%29
item.description: Dell Alienware Command Center, version 5.7.3.0 and prior, contains an improper access control vulnerability. A low privileged attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to denial of service on the local system and information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2024-22450|2024-07-03T18:25:11.941Z -- dell -- alienware%20command%20center%20%28awcc%29
item.description: Dell Alienware Command Center, versions prior to 6.2.7.0, contain an uncontrolled search path element vulnerability. A local malicious user could potentially inject malicious files in the file search path, leading to system compromise.

item.title: CVE-2024-22450|2024-04-10T07:08:12.756Z -- dell -- alienware%20command%20center%20%28awcc%29
item.description: Dell Alienware Command Center, versions prior to 6.2.7.0, contain an uncontrolled search path element vulnerability. A local malicious user could potentially inject malicious files in the file search path, leading to system compromise.

item.title: CVE-2024-0159|2024-06-06T13:06:59.272Z -- dell -- alienware%20command%20center%20%28awcc%29
item.description: Dell Alienware Command Center, versions 5.5.52.0 and prior, contain improper access control vulnerability, leading to Denial of Service on local system.
